titleStmt.title: Comfort for parents, mourning over their hopeful children, that dye young In a funeral discourse upon Jer. 31. xvii. And there is hope in thine end, saith the Lord. By Thomas Whitaker, minister of the Gospel at Leeds, in York-shire.
titleStmt.author: Whitaker, Thomas, 1650 or 51-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Dunton, at the Raven, in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Tightly bound, with some print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
